title: MySQLTRIM()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLTRIM()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Remove leading and trailing spaces from a string:
SELECT TRIM('    SQL Tutorial    ') AS TrimmedString;

Definition and Usage
The TRIM() function removes leading and trailing spaces from a string.
Syntax
TRIM(
string
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
string
Required. The string to remove leading and trailing spaces from
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers MySQLTRIM()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MySQLTRIM()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of MySQLTRIM()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
